Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards put up 37 points, 8 assists, and 7 rebounds on 48/46/75 shooting from the field against the LA Clippers.
Edwards showed insane fourth-quarter heroics, lifting his team to victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Prior to facing the Clippers, Edwards shared an intimate moment with a young fan named Luca who was battling cancer. Edwards proclaimed that he'd wear an orange wristband for the rest of his career in dedication to Luca.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards is known for being one of the most brash trash-talkers in the NBA but showed a different side of himself after the game against the Clippers.
For one reason or another, Edwards seems to really light up when facing the Clippers. In 17 career games against them, he's averaged 22.1 points, 5.1 rebounds, and 3.9 assists.
